boardgame.name: Enemy Action: Ardennes
boardgame.description: Publisher's advertisement:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Enemy Action: Ardennes is the first in a series of card-driven war games on pivotal operations and campaigns in World War II, from John Butterfield, designer of RAF, D-Day at Omaha Beach, Ambush! and Hell’s Highway. Each game in the series allows for play by two players or one player, playing either side in the conflict._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Enemy Action delivers fun, tense wargaming with a focus on command and capabilities:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Low complexity with constant decision points for both sides;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Two-player competition;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Solitaire play of either side with an innovative system governing enemy command and tactics;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Card-driven impulse system, with multi-purpose cards that can be played to activate formations, implement command events, or gain tactical advantages in combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Diceless and chartless combat system _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; players draw combat chits that build a narrative of each combat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;EA: Ardennes portrays the German offensive against the western Allies in December 1944 -- the Battle of the Bulge. Each player controls the German or Allied (US and British) side. If playing solo, the game system controls the other side._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Map scale: 2.5 miles per hex. Hexes are oversized for easy counter handling._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Unit Scale: Regiments, brigades and divisions_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Time scale: One day per turn, with several impulses in each turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;BGG wiki page with many clarifications and hints and errata:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Enemy Action: Ardennes German Solo FAQ_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2015 Golden Geek Best Solo Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Podcast #13 Roger Miller Revolution Games Interview
boardgame.boardgamefamily: World War 2: Battle of the Bulge

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

*** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,500 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $12 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. And if you want this game plus anything else that I am selling on BGG, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll of course be happy to add other items on in order to save you on shipping! North Carolina residents pay 7% sales tax. Cheers, Jason PS: We have many Osprey books in stock not listed on BGG. The prices are well under publisher rates; if you are interested in them, please let me know!

Compass Games (CPA1018) Enemy Action: Ardennes is a fun, tense new gaming system from John Butterfield. A card-driven and dice-less system featuring three games in one box: 2 solitaire games and a two-player game. The first module, Ardennes, portrays the German offensive against the Western Allies in December 1944 - the Battle of the Bulge.

Compass Games (CPA1018) Enemy Action: Ardennes is a fun, tense new gaming system from John Butterfield. The first module, Ardennes, portrays the German offensive against the Western Allies in December 1944 - the Battle of the Bulge.

Punched and sorted in tray, as new just laid out once and played. too many games need to thin out. Everything in excellent condition. Cards are sleeved as well. Payment by PayPal. All items will be sent recorded and insured. (That’s why it’s a bit more). PayPal fees will apply. Overseas postal price on requests. Generally, your looking at around 13 -15 pounds for most European Destinations outside uk. Alternatively, you are welcome to come and collect. Live in Blackpool Area, UK. PM me with contact details

Punched and complete. Of the 504 counters, 444 are punched, rounded, and sorted into two GMT trays. The unpunched 60 are the duplicate combat chits. The 110 cards are all sleeved.

The game is like new. I just carefully punched a handfull of miscellaneous counters. I glanced once over the rules, opened the 2player-map once. Thats it. Shipping costs for Europe will be between 7-15 Euros. I will try to ship the same day. Please contact me for exact shipping costs :)
